scripts.410: echo "use prisma and @prisma/client 4.10.0" && npm i @prisma/client@4.10.0 prisma@4.10.0 &> '/dev/null'
scripts.411: echo "use prisma and @prisma/client 4.11.0" && npm i @prisma/client@4.11.0 prisma@4.11.0 &> '/dev/null'
scripts.db:start: docker-compose up -d && echo "wait for mssql to start a minute :( ...." && sleep 8
scripts.repro: npm i && run-s db:start db:reset db:seed 410 dev 411 dev
